alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Lee; Moore; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 2:59PM EDT until July 14 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Moore County in central North Carolina... Harnett County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Cumberland County in central North Carolina... Lee County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wake County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Hoke County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 259 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Pittsboro to near Pope AFB, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Cary, Sanford, Lillington, Fort Liberty, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, Pope AFB, Apex and Holly Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chatham; Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Lee; Moore; Wake
